name: Date with a Werewolf
description: A  date... with a werewolf? A  short cute game about an awkward first date between two long distance lovers.  Play as Emily, a young 22 year old woman looking forward to her first date with her long distance boyfriend Frazer.  Frazer has cancelled every date you've tried to schedule before this, is he hiding some terrible secret? This game was made in less than one month to test code for more advanced games in the future. I hope you'll all enjoy it.
